name: NSCollectionView.UpdateAction
desc: Constants indicating the type of action being performed on an item.

items.name: case insert
items.desc: Insert the item into the collection view.

items.name: case delete
items.desc: Remove the action from the collection view.

items.name: case reload
items.desc: Reload the item, which consists of deleting and then inserting the item.

items.name: case move
items.desc: Move the item from its current location to a new location.

items.name: case none
items.desc: Take no action on the item.
